title: Help ID Part 2
content:
Hey guys,  
Can anyone help me identify either of the two fonts in these pictures?

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_2468.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020081730/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_2468.JPG) | 1.42 MB |
| [IMG\_2638.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020081730/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_2638.jpg) | 432.88 KB |
author: MJMerlino

comments.content: "Prettiest" looks like [Olicana Smooth](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020081730/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/g-type/olicana/). alt P in use. not quite positive on the s tho.
Actually it is Olicana Smooth! There's stylistic alternatives! Thank you!
Now just to figure out the first lol
If you watch The Great Gatsby you can see it make an appearance for a couple of seconds spelling 'afternoon' right across the screen.
